page.title: 13OCCUPATIONS IN MONYASH
page.content: There have always been alot of {farmers}in Monyash.{Fifty years ago there were many other trades and occupations in the village{_joiner, {blacksmith,cobbler,tar maker,mason, {veterinary surgeon,candle maker,coal {merchant.}There were several small shops _ butchers,newsagents,grocer, pariffin and candle shop,sweets and bread shop and a general store.There was even a village policeman.Today most of these have gone.We have{one {general store,a small post office and {one pub.}There is also an{antique {shop. } From the results of our survey, about{41% of people work outside the {village}doing a wide variety of jobs _teaching,hotel work,quarrying, haulage,building and so on.{26% work {in the village}_mostly in farming.{33% {are either retired or unemployed. }
